text: Hagi Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Mopafinti maka'za hagesie. Za'ara zane zafane rumofo rumofo raga'a revava hanaza zantamimo'za hagesaze. Ragazmifina avima'a efore hanie! Hanige'za zafa rgama rentesazana e'i zamagu'afinka avima'amo'za zamagri'agna raga rentesaze. Hige'za mopafina ana zantamimo'za efore hu'naze.
